author: Mark Astorga
comment: Very disappointing for a paid version! Cant even record video when it starts recording. It can view the cameras, take snapshots. But CANT take videos, it just says start recording, when recording stops the supposedly captured video is none existence. Please DO FIX IT

author: A Google User
comment: Works very well. Many cameras supported. Frequent updates. UI needs serious overhaul. Just amateur and ugly IMHO. Please get a graphic designer to help redesign it. For the love of god man when are you going to get this thing upgraded graphically? Hello?

author: Zvara Tímea
comment: Since yesterday update (version v6.5.9.) I can see the camera pics again (Hikvision DS-CD 2442FWD-IW) when I am on wifi as it did not work for the last couple of days. It could not connect to the dedicated port. Now it is ok.  (Samsung Galaxy S6) If I use my mobile net, the cam keeps on loading and it never loads. Is it possible to maintain? I've been using this app for many years and it always worked both on wifi and mobile net. :)

author: A Google User
comment: Was absolutely fabulous, now it just complains about data corruption and tells me to uninstall/reinstall, which does not fix the problem. Completely unusable now.  Could be related to multiple Google accounts, so beware.

author: A Google User
comment: Since yesterday all cans have no connection HELP  does what it says on the can!! recommended got 26 cams on it :) was ok but keeps crashing since  last update

reply.author: Robert Chou
reply.content: recent hiccup.  please reboot phone now.

author: Daniel johnson
comment: Been using this app for years, it has an excellent user interface, simple to use, supports just about any cam you can throw at it, constantly adding support for new cams, recommended to anyone!

author: Norman G.
comment: Updated the firmware on my swann dvr8-8075. Now the app will not work with it. Very disappointed.

author: Jeffrey Baker
comment: Well worth it after using the lite version for years. Works great with my ancient Tenvis cameras and old Samsung Galaxy. Bought February 2018 to remove the ads in the lite version and so far so good.

author: Dave Eurich
comment: Best cam app. Would like to have RING added like NEST. Works great with my other cams. Best app for the job, hands down.

author: Jumpin Jehosaphat
comment: Every App Should Get The support and updates like ip cam pro!
Handles all my cameras except Wyze

author: Steve Kersh
comment: Wonderful app and I love the widgets this app has as well!  I use those daily!

author: so kay
comment: Great app. Love it. Especially the garage door opener! For those griping about the interface, its very user friendly, we really dont want it changed. Give them a different app Robert, but dont change this please, it's still the best. No other compares. No problems with updates for new phone,  don't update old phones-keep ur old apk files. Those who say foscam or other doesn't work anymore, it's ur camera not the app. Yeah, foscams break. Get another one.  Got my traffic cams back. Thank you.

author: CHRISTOPHER RHOMBERG
comment: This is the best IP camera app for android that I know. I even use it now as a mini DVR on an android TV box. It uses its own internal movement detection and emails pics of the videos it records. I have a mix of makes and models of cameras and it has good drivers for all of them. My only trouble at the moment I'd that it won't write the video clips to the SD card or other external memory, only the internal memory of the android device. I'm using android v6

One of the best apps for cameras. but no support for internal and external ip address/port per camera. creating 2 camera entries is not fun and a hassle to switch groups. it should auto detect internal or external based on wifi or cell network or just try both. Its basic stuff.

author: Michael George
comment: Been using for years but since the update can't view my camera when away from home any.... IP address correct as cam view from website but not app now

author: Ken Dean
comment: Best cam viewer app I have ever seen!

author: Yehezkiel Christanto
comment: After updating, cannot view my ip cam again
Amazing little app! The App for IP cam!!!

author: rafael saavedra
comment: Great app for up cameras

author: Thomas Clancy
comment: Don't be fooled by the high rating as it's mostly based on the fact that this app works better than OTHER apps, not because this app is actually 5 star material.  The Interface is bloody awful and the author rarely responds to feedback.  Although the author is continually updating the app (drivers for more cams etc. ) he has made no effort to improve the interface and/or follow the Android material design despite numerous requests from customers. Shame really, because otherwise it could be a decent app. Update: 12/29/17. Still no UI improvement over the past few years.  Removing another star.

author: ParkersburgWood Pro
comment: Love this app. I bought your pro app on my phone then downloaded it on my tablet to view as well but cant get the pro version that I already paid for. HeLP.

author: Methias Cat
comment: Works great with both my foscam and airlink.-edit- 12/29/17  since last update I can no longer talk or listen on two foscam cams from my Sony tablet.

author: Fred Usherson
comment: The app use to work. Now it doesn't. There's no tech support.

author: Jon Rayner
comment: Great app, plethora of models makes it so universal!!! Been using for years now :) keep up the good work!

author: Daniel J. Grinkevich
comment: Works well but doesn't support EC384 certificates.

author: Tai Kelvin
comment: Used to include public webcam for traffic..... now duno used it

author: Nathan LaFollette
comment: Does what I need it to do! Great App!

author: Ed
comment: Best app for cams
I have 1080p cameras but even with the best phone still looks poor video quality when viewing. .. Terrible picture quality but does function.

author: Jesse Hurd
comment: Worked great with zmodo DVR but it will not contact with my LaView NVR I have read many forms and others have the same issue. 5 star if it's fixed

author: Isaiah Otten
comment: TRIED WITH MY IP CAM AND COULDN'T GET IT TO CONNECT. Followed directions for hours to the T still without avail. I THEN TRIED TO GET MY REFUND AND IT WOULDN'T ALLOW ME TO GET MY REFUND. I WOULD HIGHLY APPRECIATE IT IF I COULD JUST GET MY MONEY BACK... Still 3 weeks after complaint without so much as a response from the Dev...

author: Barel Raviv
comment: Really just the best ip camera app out there, been useing it for 6 years now , simple and efficient. Thanks
Well done app, works better than any provided by the camera vendors, with ongoing updates

author: Mike G
comment: Love stunnel

author: Jason Meyer
comment: Great app for viewing security cameras.

author: Tony Alba
comment: Love the app! I only have one problem I updated my security system and my new system Doesn't work with this app.  It's a Samsung  model sdr-b85300. This is my favorite app, would pay for it all over again! Please help need p2p setup

author: A Google User
comment: Latest update made it VERY difficult to figureout how to access settings on my Android 4.2.2 Samsung 7.0" tablet.  PLEASE FIX THIS PAID VERSION OF THIS APP to CLEARLY show how to access full settings.

author: Darrell Deibel
comment: I have used this App for more that 7 years and love what it does Thanks for the App

author: A Google User
comment: Have had this app for a long time ànd it has recently gone down hill. It was at one stage flawless but it cuts in and out now. I'm a pro user and it's a shame as it was at one time a great app.
